longDescription:
A privacy-focused timer app that uses haptic feedback to keep you on track. No data collection, no tracking - just pure functionality that respects your privacy.

Perfect for workouts, meditation sessions, cooking, or any activity where you need reliable timing without distractions. The app provides gentle haptic vibrations at customizable intervals to help you stay focused and maintain your rhythm.

Key Features:

  • Customizable timer intervals with haptic feedback
  • Clean, distraction-free interface
  • No data collection or tracking
  • Works offline with no internet required
  • Simple and intuitive design

Stay on track with gentle reminders that respect your privacy and focus.
